# ActionSheet.Button

**Type Alias**

A button representing an operation of an action sheet presentation.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Button = Alert.Button
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/ActionSheet] button is type-aliased to the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Alert] button type, which provides default, cancel, and destructive styles.
title: ActionSheet.Button
